item.title: Presentation Ninja
item.description: Presentation Ninja class: center, middle, inverse, title-slide # Presentation Ninja ## ⚔with xaringan (in blogdown) ### Yihui Xie ### 2017/07/28 --- background-image: url(https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Sharingan_triple.svg) ??? Image credit: [Wikimedia Commons](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Sharingan_triple.svg) --- class: center, middle # xaringan ### /ʃæ.'riŋ.ɡæn/ --- class: inverse, center, middle # Get Started --- # Hello World Install the **xaringan** package from [Github](https://github.com/yihui/xaringan): ```r devtools::install_github("yihui/xaringan") ``` -- You are recommended to use the [RStudio IDE](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/), but you do not have to.
